name: Screenleap
headline: One-click screen sharing with installation-free viewing on all devices
description:
Screenleap allows you to share your screen and view it from any web-enabled device without installing any software. Our mission is to do for screen sharing what Dropbox did for file sharing: make screen sharing a hassle-free experience that just works across all devices.

We also allow developers to add screen sharing to their applications using our API (http://www.screenleap.com/api). Our screen sharing service has been integrated into a variety of products and services ranging from audio-conferences services to e-learning platforms, sales tools, and support applications.

founders.name: Lawrence Gentilello
founders.description: Lawrence is CEO and Founder at Optery. Prior to founding Optery, Lawrence led Accenture’s Data Management Platforms practice in North America and was a Product Management and Technical Consulting leader at Oracle and BlueKai. As an entrepreneur, Lawrence co-founded the remote collaboration company Screenleap and launched the first online facebook at Stanford in 1999. Lawrence is an alumnus of Stanford (BA), Duke (MBA), and Y Combinator (Optery (W22) and Screenleap (W12)).

[Screenleap](https://screenleap.com/</>)
Share your screen instantly to any device with a browser.
Share your screen now
screen sharing software
  * ### Quick & Easy Sharing
Share your screen or camera on desktop computers without installing any software. Share your screen on tablets and smartphones using our native apps.
  * ### Installation-Free Viewing
View from any device with a browser (including PCs, Macs, tablets, and smartphones) without installing any software.
  * ### Customer Support
Need to support another user? You can easily view someone else's screen by sending them a link and asking them to grant permission.


  * ### Video Conferencing
Video conferencing allows you to share your camera with your viewers to connect with them before jumping into sharing your screen.
  * ### Audio Conferencing
2-way audio is available for all of your meetings using your computer's microphone and speakers without installing any software.
  * ### Easy Website Integration
Add live interaction (screen sharing, video conferencing, audio conferencing) to your website in minutes using our [website integration](https://screenleap.com/</integration>) feature.


  * ### Frictionless Collaboration
Share control of your computer with your viewers and allow them to point out things on your screen without requiring them to install any software.
  * ### Cloud Recording
Easily record your meetings and share them with others afterwards. No need to manually upload your recordings.
  * ### Viewer Registration
Capture your viewers' information so you can follow up with them afterwards. Export viewer registration information to your favorite CRM application.


**NEW!** Easily add live interaction to your website without coding using our new [website integration](https://screenleap.com/</integration>) feature »

generated_description:
**Screenleap Overview**

Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's W12 batch, Screenleap is a dynamic company based in San Carlos, California, with a lean team of four. Their mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to enable one-click screen sharing without the hassle of installation, much like how Dropbox revolutionized file sharing. 

**Core Offerings**

Screenleap allows users to share their screens or cameras instantly on any device equipped with a web browser—no downloads necessary. This platform stands out for its installation-free viewing, which caters to a wide range of users, from corporate teams needing to collaborate remotely to educators conducting online classes. Their services include:

- **Screen Sharing:** Share your entire screen or just an application window quickly, without software installations.
- **Video and Audio Conferencing:** Engage with participants using two-way audio and video support, facilitating a complete conference experience.
- **Easy Integration:** Developers can seamlessly integrate Screenleap’s functionalities into their own applications via their API, enhancing tools like e-learning platforms, CRM systems, and sales tools.
- **Collaboration Features:** Users can share control over their screens, allowing viewers to interact without needing to install anything.
- **Cloud Recording:** Meetings can be recorded effortlessly, enabling users to share follow-up content without extra steps.

Screenleap also prioritizes customer engagement by allowing viewer registration, thereby helping businesses capture leads and follow up effectively.

**Reputation and Feedback**

The platform enjoys a strong reputation, with users frequently praising its simplicity and efficiency. It holds an impressive 4.5/5 rating based on 445 reviews, a testament to its reliability and user experience.

**Where to Find Them**

To see Screenleap in action or learn more about pricing and sign-up, visit their website at [screenleap.com](https://screenleap.com). Whether you’re looking to enhance remote collaboration, conduct engaging online meetings, or integrate screen sharing into your existing applications, Screenleap offers a solution that’s user-friendly, effective, and quick to deploy. 

In the evolving landscape of digital collaboration, Screenleap is not just another tool; it's an essential innovation that makes screen sharing as effortless as it should be.
